A. Direct myocardial injury—SARS‐CoV‐2 viral invasion of cardiomyocytes is thought to occur by binding to angiotensin‐converting enzyme 2 (ACE2). The binding of SARS‐CoV‐2 to ACE2 can result in alteration of ACE2 signaling pathways, leading to acute myocardial and lung injury, however, autopsy studies have thus far failed to confirm this pathway.
